lines.gurmukhi: mwns jnmu Dwir sMgiq suBwv giq; gur qy gurmiq durmiq ibibiD ibDwnI hY [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: In the human birth, one is influenced by good or bad company. Thus the teachings of Guru instills virtues whereas bad company fills a person with base wisdom.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: mnu`Kw jnm nUM Dwrx hwry AwdmI dy suBwv dI gqI dSw Xw pRivrqI sMgiq BlI burI im`lq Anuswr hoXw krdI hY[ gurmiq nUM Dwrx krn kr ky qQw durmiq kwrx auh dSw Anyk pRkwr dy FMgwˆ dI huMdI hY[ ArQwq nÎwry nÎwry nwmwˆ dÍwry AwKI jwˆdI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: swDusMig pdvI Bgiq Aau ibbykI jn; jIvn mukiq swDU bRhmigAwnI hY [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: In the company of true people, one attains a position of a devotee, an analytical person, liberated alive and possessor of divine knowledge.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijhVI pdvI ies nUM swDU sMgq ivc pRwpq huMdI hY aus dy ieh ieh nwm AwKy jwXw krdy hn: Bgq, ibbykI, jn syvk, jIvn mukq, swDU Aqy bRhm igAwnI[

lines.gurmukhi: ADm AswD sMg cor jwr Aau jUAwrI; Tg btvwrw mqvwrw AiBmwnI hY [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Association with evil and vice-ridden people turns a man into thief, gambler, deceitful, dacoit, addict and arrogant.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: Aru AswD sMg BYVI sMgq ivc bYiTAwˆ ijnwˆ BYiVAwˆ nwvwˆ nwl pukwirAw jwˆdw hY auh ieh hn: ADm, nIc, pwˆbr, cor, Xwr, juAwrIAw, Tg, vwt mwrx vwlw DwVvI, mqvwlw, sOdweI, mUrK Aqy AiBmwnI hMkwrIAw[

lines.gurmukhi: Apuny Apuny rMg sMg suKu mwnY ibsu; gurmiq giq gurmuiK pihcwnI hY [165[

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: The whole world enjoys peace and pleasures in their own way. But a rare person has understood the intensity of the blessing of Guru's teaching and happiness it gives. (165)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ibsu ibsÍ sMswr ivKy, AQvw Blw AOr burw nwmnw pRwpq kr ky swrw sMswr hI ieauˆ Apxy Apxy rMg mOjU dy sMg ivc suK AwnMd nUM mwx irhw hY[ pRMqU gurmiq dy DwrÎwˆ jo giq au`qm dSw vw igAwn gurmuK nUM pRwpq huMdw hY auh sMswr qoˆ inAwrw hI hY[ Es nUM kyvl gurmuK hI sÎwxdy AnBau kr skdy hn ]165]
